USBCUPDATER(8) System Manager's Manual USBCUPDATER(8)

NAME

usbcupdater — update the USB-C subsystem components

SYNOPSIS

usbcupdater

DESCRIPTION

The usbcupdater command updates components required by the USB-C subsystem.

This tool is intended to be used by FirmwareUpdateLauncher and is not intended to be called directly by the user outside of this context.

DIAGNOSTICS

The usbcupdater utility exits 0 on success, and >0 if an error occurs.

HISTORY

The usbcupdater utility first appeared in OS X 10.12.

May 16, 2016 Mac OS X
